description.para: Detaches the shared memory from process space.

tr.td: Function succeeds in detaching the shared memory from process space.

remarks.para: When users do not need to operate on shared memory, this shared memory can be detached from process space by the method Detach, thus thread in the process can not access this memory block again. Calling this method does not cause any effect on other processes using this shared memory block.
If users have not called ISharedMemory::Attach to map this shared memory to process space before calling Detach, it will return E_INVALID_OPERATION.

system.system_name: Windows 2000 or later; Elastos2.0 or later
